title: Brain implant uses AI to give speech-disabled patients a voice
description: Researchers at Stanford University have developed new technology that could lead to game-changing advancements in assisted-speech devices. The small sensor is implanted in the brain and could help speech-impaired patients carry a conversation. TODAY’s Jacob Soboroff reports.

title: Ukraine strikes Russian naval landing warship in Crimea
description: Ukraine struck a large Russian landing warship in Crimea with cruise missiles in an overnight attack that killed at least one person and could hinder any Russian attempt to seize more Ukrainian territory along the Black Sea coast.
